root.description: Set custom root path. Note : every other paths given in will be relative to this root path.

db.description: Set custom root path. Note : every other paths given in will be relative to this root path.

injectors.description: Set .js or .json or http url here.

rewriters.description: Set .js or .json or http url here.

store.description: Set .js or .json or http url here.

environment.description:
Set path to environment files.

This will only be used in vscode Mock Server Extension.
This will not be used in @r35007/mock-server cli.

port.description: Set Custom Port number. Set 0 to pick a random available port.

host.description: Set custom host or Ip address. Give empty string to use Local Ip address.

enumDescriptions: All direct values will be set to mock attribute
All direct values will be set to fetch attribute
Only string is set to fetch attribute and all other direct values are set to mock attribute
dbMode.description: Helps to set the direct route value to the selected attribute.

noCors.description: Disable CORS ( Cross Origin Resource Sharing ).

watch.description: Watch for changes and restarts the server.

watchFiles.description:
Set files and folder path to watch for changes. By default all the paths in `#paths#` are included for watches.

This will only be used in vscode Mock Server Extension.
This will not be used in @r35007/mock-server cli.

ignoreFiles.description:
Set files and folder path to ignore changes.

This will only be used in vscode Mock Server Extension.
This will not be used in @r35007/mock-server cli.

duplicates.description:
If true, transformDb will iterate duplicate routes using _IterateRoutes middleware.

This will only be used in vscode Mock Server Extension.
This will not be used in @r35007/mock-server cli.

homePage.description:
Enable Mock Server Home Page.

This will only be used in vscode Mock Server Extension.
This will not be used in @r35007/mock-server cli.

openInside.description:
Open Home Page inside VS Code, instead of default browser.

This will only be used in vscode Mock Server Extension.
This will not be used in @r35007/mock-server cli.

showInfoMsg.description:
Change this to false if you don't want to show information pop up messages.

This will only be used in vscode Mock Server Extension.
This will not be used in @r35007/mock-server cli.

show.description: Change this to false if you don't want the button to show in statusbar.

position.description: Set a custom position of the statusbar. Note: Please reload the extension to take effect.

priority.description: Helps to reorder the placement of the statusbar. Minimum priority moves the statusbar to left most. Note: Please reload the extension to take effect.

statusBar.description:
This object will only be used in vscode Mock Server Extension.
This will not be used in @r35007/mock-server cli.
